description:
CP-0 enters the Labophase and starts attacking the Thousand Sunny as soon as they find it. Luffy reunites with Nami and the others but finds out that Vegapunk is missing. Meanwhile, Bonney is pressing Vegapunk to change back her father Kuma.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chichi o Modose! Hakanaki Bonney no Negai!
Rends-moi mon père. Le rêve éphémère de Bonney !
Turn Back My Father! Bonney`s Futile Wish!
Verwandle meinen Vater zurück! – Bonneys vergeblicher Wunsch!
أعد إليّ أبي! أمنية بوني العقيمة!
父を戻せ! 儚きボニーの願い!
